Class EditPasswordPolicyBean

java.lang.Object

public class EditPasswordPolicyBean extends Object implements EditPasswordPolicy
Session Bean implementation of methods for editing password policy

  • Method Details

    • getPwd_Policy

      public EditPwdPolicyRequest getPwd_Policy()
      Return a com.yardi.shared.QSECOFR.EditPwdPolicyRequest container.

      Clients use this method to obtain a container which holds all of the password policy elements that can be modified by the user. The com.yardi.ejb.model.Pwd_Policy entity is found and then mapped to the EditPwdPolicyRequest container which is then returned.

      Specified by:
      getPwd_Policy in interface EditPasswordPolicy
      Returns:
      a container which holds all of the password policy elements that can be modified by the user.

    • newPwdPolicy

      public Pwd_Policy newPwdPolicy(EditPwdPolicyRequest editPwdPolicyRequest)
      Construct a new com.yardi.ejb.model.Pwd_Policy entity by mapping com.yardi.shared.QSECOFR.EditPwdPolicyRequest container to Pwd_Policy entity.

      Several columns in the PWD_POLICY database table may contain null. To map these correctly from EditPwdPolicyRequest, test for a String with a value of "null". If the field from EditPwdPolicyRequest is "null" set the corresponding field in Pwd_Policy entity to null. Otherwise, the corresponding field in Pwd_Policy entity is mapped to String or Short.

      Specified by:
      newPwdPolicy in interface EditPasswordPolicy
      Parameters:
      editPwdPolicyRequest - a container that holds all the password policy elements which can be modified by the user. *
      Returns:
      password policy entity

    • persist

      public void persist(EditPwdPolicyRequest editPwdPolicyRequest)
      Persist a new com.yardi.ejb.model.Pwd_Policy entity.

      This method accepts a com.yardi.shared.QSECOFR.EditPwdPolicyRequest container and maps it to a Pwd_Policy entity by delegating to newPwdPolicy() before persisting the Pwd_Policy entity.

      Specified by:
      persist in interface EditPasswordPolicy
      Parameters:
      editPwdPolicyRequest - a container which holds all the password policy elements that can be modified by the user.

    • updateAll

      public void updateAll(EditPwdPolicyRequest editPwdPolicyRequest)
      Update all of the password policy elements that can be modified by the user.

      This method accepts a com.yardi.shared.QSECOFR.EditPwdPolicyRequest container and maps it to a com.yardi.ejb.model.Pwd_Policy entity by delegating to newPwdPolicy() before merging the state to the persistence context.

      Specified by:
      updateAll in interface EditPasswordPolicy
      Parameters:
      editPwdPolicyRequest - an EditPwdPolicyRequest container which holds all the password policy elements that can be modified by the user.
